# Uniform { #water_tank.random.Uniform }

`random.Uniform(self, min, max)`

Uniform distribution, returning values between `min` and `max`.

## Parameters

| Name   | Type   | Description   | Default    |
|--------|--------|---------------|------------|
| `min`  | float  | lower bound.  | _required_ |
| `max`  | float  | upper bound.  | _required_ |

## Methods

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [sample](#water_tank.random.Uniform.sample) | Samples from the distribution and returns an array of the desired shape. |

### sample { #water_tank.random.Uniform.sample }

`random.Uniform.sample(shape)`

Samples from the distribution and returns an array of the desired shape.
